## lookup1d variable

Returns function accepting a single index arg used to lookup value in given array. No bounds checks are done.

```
[...map(lookup1d([10, 20, 30]), [2,0,1])]
// [ 30, 10, 20 ]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lookup1d: <T>(src: T[]) => (i: number) => T
```
